Thousands of drivers funneled onto a two-lane highway, spending hours in traffic to reach safety along Sacramento Valley’s major north-to-south evacuation route. Lack of adequate evacuation routes is costing us lives every year. Our legislation could save lives in times of crisis
Just two years ago, nearly 200,000 Californians were forced to evacuate when they learned that Oroville Dam, the tallest dam in the nation, was on the verge of failing.
This legislation would authorize $1 billion to help communities improve evacuation routes in the wake of increased climate-related disasters across the country.

THREAD: Today, I, along with .@USRepKeating, introduced the Enhancing the Strength and Capacity of America’s Primary Evacuation Routes (ESCAPE) Act, with .@SenMarkey sponsoring the Senate companion bill. https://garamendi.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressmen-garamendi-keating-introduce-bill-fund-evacuation-routes …

Thank you to all of those who are taking care of their mothers today and every day.

This gave me pause and determination to fight for a cure for this disease that 5.8 million Americans are currently living with. I am a member of the Congressional Alzheimer’s Task Force and I am committed to ending this horrible disease.

As I celebrate Mother’s Day today, I also can’t help but think of Patti’s mother, Merle. Towards the end of her life, Patti and I cared for her every day and witnessed firsthand how devastating the effects of Alzheimer’s disease are. pic.twitter.com/53CWp2VvuQ
Happy Mother’s Day to an amazing woman who never stopped serving her community. She blessed us all.

She never stopped teaching and planning for her children. In going through her papers, I found a letter from a U.S. Congressman responding to her request for career advice for her 10-year-old son, John. She was my number one fan and guided me through life.

My mom, Maryjane, died two years ago at 93. She had lost her own mother in childbirth when she was three and was raised by her devoted father who taught her values and trained her bright mind. I was the second of her seven children. pic.twitter.com/7wlTxX66Gm
